title: Game Crashing Whole PC Only On Summoners Rift
body:
I currently am experiencing PC crashing freezes but only on summoners rift. It seems i can play for a few seconds get to lane and then black and white none responsive monitor screens and screeching audio. I have to restart my PC. Sometimes I can play longer but it always crashes before 3 minutes. 

The thing that is odd is, I updated my graphics drivers, reinstalled the game and upgraded to the new client and thought it was fixed because this issue does not happen in ARAM queues. I though it was fixed but apparently it only happens in summoners rift.

I am not having similar graphical freezes in any other games such as Overwatch and etc.

Any help?  My video card is an AMD Radeon HD 7800.

replies.body: From the ticket I opened, we gathered that the crash was caused by the game using my integrated graphics instead of my Nvidia card. You have to set the game .exe to run on your graphics card specifically through the Nvidia control panel (or whatever the AMD equivalent is). If that's not an option, like it wasn't for me, then you have to disable the integrated graphics through your BIOS, which will vary among motherboards.

It sounds like this might be caused by some type of hardware error, so trying to update your drivers was a good start! There might still be some unneeded programs running in the background that are affecting league. Be sure that you have disabled the [**XBox Game**](https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-turn-off-game-bar-windows-10-a.html) bar just in case 

Take a look at the other steps in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for other steps you can check, and let me know if you're still having issues.

GTX 970 here, I may have something similar but I pretty much play ARAM exclusively. Just happened 4 times in a row: black screens with a few seconds of queued audio then nothing, forced to restart. Updating graphics driver now, hope it resolves it.
